Uses of Class
com.codename1.ui.PeerComponent

Packages that use PeerComponent
com.codename1.impl The implementation package should not be used by developers, it is an internal implementation detail which will break compatibility between major Codename One releases. 
com.codename1.ui Main widget package containing the component/container "composite" similar both in terminology and design to Swing/AWT.
